name: The Ice Lake
description:
The Ice Lake
==========

Made for the LOWREZJAM2020. Couldn't get volumetrics working for webgl (of course) so for those who want the full experience, check out the downloadable version. 

I'd love to hear feedback as it's really my first, finished 3d lowrezjam title. It's also the first time I've done a more narrative based experience. 

Story
====

Last thing you remember was riding your bicycle when you saw a flash of bright lights. How you got here, you've no idea. 

HERE IS A HINT: 
Cave's on the left (important at the end)

Final Note
========
Special thanks to Quaternious for providing his amazing models and tutorials all the time.
